definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
The Rape of Nanking (1997 documentary book by Iris Chang 張純如|张纯如)
pinyin: Nan2 jing1 Da4 tu2 sha1 Shi4 jian4

sentences.english: And sure enough, pogroms arise in places.
sentences.chinese: 很快各地出現了大屠殺。

sentences.english: The bloodbath or the death spiral?
Memorial to the victims of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 種族大屠殺遇難者紀念碑。

sentences.english: Emotional antisemitism, he wrote, merely ended in pogroms.
sentences.chinese: 他寫道，情感上的反猶太主義將以大屠殺而告終。

sentences.english: This massacre is one of the towering obscenities of other time.
sentences.chinese: 這次大屠殺是當今最令人髮指的事件之一。

sentences.english: And hope is what Yad Vashem is all about!
sentences.chinese: 而盼望正是大屠殺紀念館的主旨。

sentences.english: The battlefield was a scene of utter carnage.
sentences.chinese: 戰場完全是一片大屠殺的慘象。

sentences.english: There were rumors of massacres on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 大屠殺的謠言開始從雙方流傳出來。

sentences.english: Dig up lots of massacre victims?
sentences.chinese: 挖了一堆大屠殺受難者出來？

sentences.english: Demjanjuk is alleged to have taken part in the mass murder of Jews at the Sobibor concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 他還被指控參與了索比堡集中營的猶太人大屠殺。

sentences.english: Vonnegut prefers not to make a narrative of the Dresden massacre.
sentences.chinese: 馮尼格不想爲讀者講述德累斯頓大屠殺的過程。

sentences.english: Then there are those who asked if Mimi remembered the Holocaust.
sentences.chinese: 然後會有些人問咪咪她是否記得大屠殺。

sentences.english: The Auschwitz concentration camp always remind the world of the holocaust .
sentences.chinese: 奧辛威茨集中營總是讓世人想起大屠殺。

sentences.english: How do the people victimized by the genocide respond?
sentences.chinese: 人們如何看待種族大屠殺？

sentences.english: A bloodbath took place when the leaders of the plot surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 密謀的主使人投降之後，一場大屠殺發生了。

sentences.english: And at this time, A-share market is in a "bloodbath" among.
sentences.chinese: 而在這個時候，A股市場正處於“大屠殺”中。

definition: to impose martial law/to impose emergency measures
sufferer/a victim of a calamity/a person in distress
sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
Marco Polo Bridge Incident of 7th July 1937, regarded as the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War 抗日戰爭|抗日战争[Kang4 Ri4 Zhan4 zheng1]
Zeppelin (name)/Graf Ferdinand von Zeppelin (1838-1917), inventor of the Zeppelin dirigible airship
